activities.name: Copy Source Data To Raw Container

dependsOn.activity: Copy Source Data To Raw Container
Copy Source Data To Raw Container

scripts.text:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.schemas WHERE name='fhir')
	EXEC('CREATE SCHEMA [fhir]')

IF OBJECT_ID('fhir.ClaimDiagnosis') IS NOT NULL
BEGIN
    DROP TABLE [fhir].[ClaimDiagnosis]
END

CREATE TABLE [fhir].[ClaimDiagnosis]
( 
	[Claim_id] [nvarchar](64)  NULL,
	[diagnosis_reference] [nvarchar](64)  NULL,
	[diagnosis_sequence] [bigint]  NULL
)
WITH
(
	DISTRIBUTION = HASH ( [Claim_id] ),
	CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
)

IF OBJECT_ID('fhir.ClaimInsurance') IS NOT NULL
BEGIN
    DROP TABLE [fhir].[ClaimInsurance]
END

CREATE TABLE [fhir].[ClaimInsurance]
( 
	[Claim_id] [nvarchar](64)  NULL,
	[insurance_coverage.display] [nvarchar](64)  NULL,
	[insurance_focal] [bit]  NULL,
	[insurance_sequence] [bigint]  NULL
)
WITH
(
	DISTRIBUTION = HASH ( [Claim_id] ),
	CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
)

IF OBJECT_ID('fhir.ClaimProcedure') IS NOT NULL
BEGIN
    DROP TABLE [fhir].[ClaimProcedure]
END

CREATE TABLE [fhir].[ClaimProcedure]
( 
	[Claim_id] [nvarchar](64)  NULL,
	[procedure_reference] [nvarchar](64)  NULL,
	[procedure_sequence] [bigint]  NULL
)
WITH
(
	DISTRIBUTION = HASH ( [Claim_id] ),
	CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
)

IF OBJECT_ID('fhir.ObservationMain') IS NOT NULL
BEGIN
    DROP TABLE [fhir].[ObservationMain]
END

CREATE TABLE [fhir].[ObservationMain]
( 
	[Observation_id] [varchar](64)  NULL,
	[resourceType] [varchar](100)  NULL,
	[issued] VARCHAR(30)  NULL,
	[status] [varchar](10)  NULL,
	[patient_id_reference] [varchar](64)  NULL,
	[encounter_id_reference] [varchar](64)  NULL,
	[effectiveDateTime] VARCHAR(30)  NULL,
	[valueQuantity_code] [varchar](50)  NULL,
	[valueQuantity_system] [varchar](100)  NULL,
	[valueQuantity_unit] [varchar](50)  NULL,
	[valueQuantity_value] [float]  NULL,
	[valueString] [nvarchar](200)  NULL
)
WITH
(
	DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN,
	HEAP
)

IF OBJECT_ID('fhir.PatientAddress') IS NOT NULL
BEGIN
    DROP TABLE [fhir].[PatientAddress]
END


CREATE TABLE [fhir].[PatientAddress]
( 
	[id] [nvarchar](64)  NULL,
	[address.city] [nvarchar](50)  NULL,
	[address.country] [nvarchar](50)  NULL,
	[address.extension.extension.url] [nvarchar](50)  NULL,
	[address.extension.extension.valueDecimal] [float]  NULL,
	[address.extension.url] [nvarchar](1000)  NULL,
	[address.postalCode] [nvarchar](50)  NULL,
	[address.state] [nvarchar](50)  NULL
)
WITH
(
	DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN,
	HEAP
)

IF OBJECT_ID('fhir.PatientIdentifier') IS NOT NULL
BEGIN
    DROP TABLE [fhir].[PatientIdentifier]
END

CREATE TABLE [fhir].[PatientIdentifier]
( 
	[patient_id] [nvarchar](64)  NULL,
	[birthDate] [nvarchar](200)  NULL,
	[deceasedDateTime] [nvarchar](200)  NULL,
	[gender] [nvarchar](50)  NULL,
	[text] [nvarchar](1000)  NULL,
	[multipleBirthBoolean] [bit]  NULL,
	[multipleBirthInteger] [bigint]  NULL,
	[resourceType] [nvarchar](100)  NULL,
	[div] [nvarchar](max)  NULL,
	[status] [nvarchar](500)  NULL,
	[identifier.system] [nvarchar](2000)  NULL,
	[identifier.type.coding.code] [nvarchar](500)  NULL,
	[identifier.type.coding.display] [nvarchar](1000)  NULL,
	[identifier.type.coding.system] [nvarchar](1000)  NULL,
	[identifier.type.text] [nvarchar](1000)  NULL,
	[identifier.value] [nvarchar](640)  NULL
)
WITH
(
	DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN,
	HEAP
)

scriptLines: address as (city as string, country as string, extension as (extension as (url as string, valueDecimal as double)[], url as string)[], line as string[], postalCode as string, state as string)[],
communication as (language as (coding as (code as string, display as string, system as string)[], text as string))[],
extension as (url as string, valueAddress as (city as string, country as string, state as string), valueDecimal as double, valueString as string)[],
identifier as (system as string, type as (coding as (code as string, display as string, system as string)[], text as string), value as string)[],
maritalStatus as (coding as (code as string, display as string, system as string)[], text as string),
name as (family as string, given as string[], prefix as string[], suffix as string[], use as string)[],
telecom as (system as string, use as string, value as string)[],
text as (div as string, status as string)

properties.description: Json data (FHIR NDJSON) exploration with Serverless

content.query:
SELECT   TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://medicaldl.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/fhir_ndjson/1tb/*/Observation.ndjson',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b',
        FIELDTERMINATOR ='0x0b'
    )
    WITH (
        line varchar(max)
    ) AS [result]

SELECT   TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'Observation.ndjson',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'JSONSource',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b',
        FIELDTERMINATOR ='0x0b'
    )
    WITH (
        line varchar(max)
    ) AS [result]

/* Flatten the NDJSO with JSON_VALUE, JSON_QUERY on CROSS APPLY OPENJSON */
/* refreence: https://diangermishuizen.com/query-json-data-in-sql-server-and-synapse-analytics/ */
/* Query 1, with only JSON_VALUE, JSON_QUERY */
SELECT top 100
    JSON_VALUE(line, '$.resourceType') AS resourceType,
    JSON_VALUE(line, '$.id') AS id,
    JSON_VALUE(line, '$.status') AS status,
    JSON_query(line, '$.category') AS category_string ,
    JSON_query(line, '$.code') AS code_string
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'Observation.ndjson',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'JSONSource',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        --FIELDQUOTE and FIELDTERMINATOR aresetto0x0b as we do not expect to find it in the file.
        FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b',
        FIELDTERMINATOR ='0x0b'
    )
    WITH (
        line varchar(max)
    ) AS [result]

/* Query 2, add CROSS APPLY OPENJSON to read array */
SELECT  top 100
    JSON_VALUE(line, '$.resourceType') AS resourceType,
    JSON_VALUE(line, '$.id') AS id,
    JSON_VALUE(line, '$.status') AS status,
    JSON_query(line, '$.valueQuantity') AS valueQuantity_string,
    valueQuantity_NestedArray_value,
    valueQuantity_NestedArray_unit ,
    JSON_query(line, '$.category') AS category_string
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'Observation.ndjson',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'JSONSource',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        --FIELDQUOTE and FIELDTERMINATOR aresetto0x0b as we do not expect to find it in the file.
        FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b',
        FIELDTERMINATOR ='0x0b'
    )
    WITH (
        line varchar(max)
    ) AS [result]
CROSS APPLY OPENJSON 
    (JSON_QUERY([line], '$.valueQuantity')) /*Note, if you want only the top most record from this array, replace this line with "(JSON_QUERY([jsonContent], '$.attribute_with_nested_array[0]'))"*/
WITH(
    [valueQuantity_NestedArray_value] varchar(255) '$.value',
    [valueQuantity_NestedArray_unit] varchar(255) '$.unit'
) AS [valueQuantity_NestedArray]


/* Query 3, multiple CROSS APPLY OPENJSON to read */
SELECT  top 100
    JSON_VALUE(line, '$.resourceType') AS resourceType,
    JSON_VALUE(line, '$.id') AS id,
    JSON_VALUE(line, '$.status') AS status,
    JSON_query(line, '$.valueQuantity') AS valueQuantity_string,
    valueQuantity_NestedArray_value,
    valueQuantity_NestedArray_unit ,
    JSON_query(line, '$.category') AS category_string,
    encounter_reference
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'Observation.ndjson',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'JSONSource',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        --FIELDQUOTE and FIELDTERMINATOR aresetto0x0b as we do not expect to find it in the file.
        FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b',
        FIELDTERMINATOR ='0x0b'
    )
    WITH (
        line varchar(max)
    ) AS [result]
CROSS APPLY OPENJSON 
    (JSON_QUERY([line], '$.valueQuantity')) /*Note, if you want only the top most record from this array, replace this line with "(JSON_QUERY([jsonContent], '$.attribute_with_nested_array[0]'))"*/
WITH(
    [valueQuantity_NestedArray_value] varchar(255) '$.value',
    [valueQuantity_NestedArray_unit] varchar(255) '$.unit'
) AS [valueQuantity_NestedArray]
CROSS APPLY OPENJSON 
    (JSON_QUERY([line], '$.encounter')) 
WITH(
    [encounter_reference] varchar(255) '$.reference'
) AS [encounter_reference_NestedArray]

SELECT TOP (100) [Claim_id]
,[insurance_coverage.display]
,[insurance_focal]
,[insurance_sequence]
 FROM [fhirdbexploration].[dbo].[claiminsurance]

 SELECT TOP (100) [Claim_id]
,[procedure_reference]
,[procedure_sequence]
 FROM [fhirdbexploration].[dbo].[claimprocedure]

 SELECT TOP (100) [Claim_id]
,[diagnosis_reference]
,[diagnosis_sequence]
 FROM [fhirdbexploration].[dbo].[patientdianosis]

source:
curated_location = "abfss://curated@" + StorageName + ".dfs.core.windows.net/fhir/"+ DatasetSize +"/"
processed_location = "abfss://processed@" + StorageName + ".dfs.core.windows.net/fhir/"+ DatasetSize +"/"
write_mode="overwrite"

from pyspark.sql.functions import explode
from pyspark.sql.functions import regexp_replace

Claim_main_explode_df = Claim_df.select(
    "id","resourceType","status","billablePeriod.end","billablePeriod.start","created","patient.display","patient.reference",
    "prescription.reference","provider.display","provider.reference","total.currency","total.value","use")

#use toDF() to rename the columns
Claim_main_df= Claim_main_explode_df.toDF(*( 
    "Claim_id","resourceType","status","billablePeriod_end","billablePeriod_start","created",
    "patient_display","patient_id_reference",
    "prescription_reference","provider_display","provider_org_id_reference","total_currency","total_value","use"))

Claim_main_df = Claim_main_df.withColumn("patient_id_reference",regexp_replace("patient_id_reference","Patient/","")).withColumn(
    "provider_org_id_reference",regexp_replace("provider_org_id_reference","Organization/",""))


# adding schema optimization
# Arshad

from pyspark.sql.functions import explode

Claim_insurance_explode_df = Claim_df.select("id", explode(Claim_df.insurance))

#use toDF() to rename the columns
Claim_insurance_df= Claim_insurance_explode_df.toDF(*( "Claim_id","insurance"))

Claim_insurance_df = Claim_insurance_df.select(
    "Claim_id","insurance.coverage.display","insurance.focal","insurance.sequence"
 ).toDF(*(   
    "Claim_id","insurance_coverage.display","insurance_focal","insurance_sequence" ))

#    base_df_explode = base_df.select(explode(base_df.entry))

from pyspark.sql.functions import explode
from pyspark.sql.functions import regexp_replace

Claim_diagnosis_explode_df = Claim_df.select(
    "id",  explode(Claim_df.diagnosis))

#use toDF() to rename the columns
Claim_diagnosis_df= Claim_diagnosis_explode_df.toDF(*( "id", "diagnosis"))

Claim_diagnosis_df = Claim_diagnosis_df.select(
    "id","diagnosis.diagnosisReference.reference","diagnosis.sequence"
 ).toDF(*(  
    "Claim_id","diagnosis_reference","diagnosis_sequence"))
Claim_diagnosis_df=Claim_diagnosis_df.withColumn(
    "diagnosis_reference",regexp_replace("diagnosis_reference","Condition/",""))

from pyspark.sql.functions import explode
from pyspark.sql.functions import regexp_replace

Claim_procedure_explode_df = Claim_df.select("id",explode(Claim_df.procedure))

#use toDF() to rename the columns
Claim_procedure_df= Claim_procedure_explode_df.toDF(*( "id","procedure"))

Claim_procedure_df = Claim_procedure_df.select(
    "id","procedure.procedureReference.reference","procedure.sequence"
 ).toDF(*(
    "Claim_id","procedure_reference","procedure_sequence"))
Claim_procedure_df=Claim_procedure_df.withColumn("procedure_reference",regexp_replace("procedure_reference","Procedure/",""))

raw_location = "abfss://raw@" + StorageName + ".dfs.core.windows.net/fhir_ndjson/"+ DatasetSize +"/*/"
processed_location = "abfss://processed@" + StorageName+ ".dfs.core.windows.net/fhir/"+ DatasetSize +"/"
write_mode="overwrite"

claimDiagonisLocation = curated_location + "Claim_diagnosis/"
spark.conf.set('claimDiagonisLocation',claimDiagonisLocation)

claimInsuranceLocation = curated_location + "Claim_insurance/"
spark.conf.set('claimInsuranceLocation',claimInsuranceLocation)

claimProcedureLocation = curated_location + "Claim_procedure/"
spark.conf.set('claimProcedureLocation',claimProcedureLocation)

from pyspark.sql.functions import explode

Observation_main_df = Observation_df.select(
    "Observation_id","resourceType","issued","status", "patient_id_reference","encounter_id_reference","effectiveDateTime",
    "valueQuantity.code","valueQuantity.system","valueQuantity.unit","valueQuantity.value","valueString").toDF(*(
    "Observation_id","resourceType","issued","status","patient_id_reference","encounter_id_reference","effectiveDateTime",
    "valueQuantity_code","valueQuantity_system",
    "valueQuantity_unit","valueQuantity_value","valueString"))

from pyspark.sql.functions import explode

Observation_category_explode_df = Observation_df.select(
    "Observation_id",
    explode(Observation_df.category)).toDF(*("Observation_id","category"))

Observation_category_explode2_df = Observation_category_explode_df.select(
    "Observation_id",
    explode(Observation_category_explode_df.category.coding)).toDF(*("Observation_id","category"))    

Observation_category_df = Observation_category_explode2_df.select("Observation_id","category.*").toDF(*("Observation_id","category_code","category_display","category_system"))

from pyspark.sql.functions import explode

Observation_code_explode_df = Observation_df.select(
    "Observation_id","code.text",explode(Observation_df.code.coding)).toDF(*("Observation_id","text","coding"))
Observation_code_df = Observation_code_explode_df.select("Observation_id","text","coding.*").toDF(*("Observation_id","code_text","coding_code","coding_display","coding_system"))

from pyspark.sql.functions import explode
from pyspark.sql.functions import explode_outer

Observation_component_explode_df = Observation_df.select(
    "Observation_id",explode(Observation_df.component))

Observation_component_explode2_df = Observation_component_explode_df.select("Observation_id",explode_outer(Observation_component_explode_df.col.code.coding),"col.code.text",
    "col.valueQuantity.code","col.valueQuantity.system","col.valueQuantity.unit","col.valueQuantity.value").toDF(*("Observation_id","component_code","component_text",
    "component_valueQuantity_code","component_valueQuantity_system","component_valueQuantity_unit","component_valueQuantity_value"))   

Observation_component_df = Observation_component_explode2_df.select("Observation_id","component_code.*","component_text",
    "component_valueQuantity_code","component_valueQuantity_system","component_valueQuantity_unit","component_valueQuantity_value").toDF(*("Observation_id","component_code",
    "component_display","component_system","component_text",
    "component_valueQuantity_code","component_valueQuantity_system","component_valueQuantity_unit","component_valueQuantity_value"))

from pyspark.sql.functions import explode

Observation_valueCodeableConcept_explode_df = Observation_df.select(
    "Observation_id",explode(Observation_df.valueCodeableConcept.coding),"valueCodeableConcept.text").toDF(*("Observation_id","coding","valueCodeableConcept_text"))

Observation_valueCodeableConcept_df = Observation_valueCodeableConcept_explode_df.select("Observation_id","coding.*","valueCodeableConcept_text").toDF(*("Observation_id",
    "valueCodeableConcept_code", "valueCodeableConcept_display","valueCodeableConcept_system","valueCodeableConcept_text"))

raw_location = "abfss://raw@" + StorageName + ".dfs.core.windows.net/fhir_ndjson/"+ DatasetSize +"/*/"
processed_location = "abfss://processed@" + StorageName + ".dfs.core.windows.net/fhir/"+ DatasetSize +"/"
write_mode="overwrite"

raw_location = "abfss://raw@" + StorageName + ".dfs.core.windows.net/fhir_ndjson/"+ DatasetSize +"/*/"
processed_location = "abfss://processed@" + StorageName + ".dfs.core.windows.net/fhir/"+ DatasetSize +"/"
write_mode="overwrite"
